alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lake and northwestern Volusia Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 419 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake George, or near Juniper Springs, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pierson, Paisley, Lake George, Eldridge and Sellers Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
